text: Rubén Díaz Jr. (born April 26, 1973) is an American politician. He was the Borough President of the Bronx in New York City. He was elected in April 2009 and reelected in 2013 and 2017. His father is politician Rubén Díaz Sr.. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Bronx borough presidents Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Rubén Díaz Jr.
